knimeNode.name: Numeric Column filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filter a set of columns all having their numeric values between a range of values.

fullDescription.intro:
Filter a set of columns all having their numeric values between a range of values.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: The numeric columns to be observed
All column must satisfy the criteria. Else only one column per row must satisfy the criteria
